## Your funnel is filled(with ghosts)
As a marketer, you spend all your time & budget driving pipeline for sales. Sadly, your hard work results in low conversions, buyers researching off your site, and wasted ad spend. And those expensive ABM platforms? Sales refuses to adopt them due to low actionability.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c800c0d49f944831ac2e5/672a5d61f05c7efcb27a740f_funnel.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c800c0d49f944831ac2e5/672ab76043fcb6df7a8ab782_billboard.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c800c0d49f944831ac2e5/672ab7e0c9769c30b4285f40_notification-ads.png)
## Build hyper-targeted ad audiences
Stop the ad spend waste. Reach the _exact_ buyers you care about (and none you don't).Target your B2B buyers across B2C ad channels and skyrocket your matchrates and ROAS.
[Learn more **‚Üí**](https://vector.co/</features/contact-level-ad-audiences>)
## Reveal exactly who's on your site
Leave the ghosting to Tinder.De-anonymize the contacts landing on your high intent pages, blog, and ads ‚Äî even if they're afraid of commitment.
[Learn more **‚Üí**](https://vector.co/</features/contact-level-website-identification>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c800c0d49f944831ac2e5/672aa390dc2fe90d9aa6bf4a_reveal-ghost.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c800c0d49f944831ac2e5/672aa445645fb9e882d20979_notification-site.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c800c0d49f944831ac2e5/672aabbf8077d2fe270055a7_image%20\(1\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c800c0d49f944831ac2e5/672aac0cb686dc5c76288741_notification-intent.png)
## Know who's searching before they find you
A majority of buying research happens _off_ your site.But legacy intent providers can only tell you which _companies_ are in-market ‚Äî leaving markets and sellers stuck in a funnel of darkness, guessing.
[Learn more **‚Üí**](https://vector.co/</features/contact-level-intent>)
##  Predict where to focus your efforts
Replace your old-school ABM campaigns with contact-based predictive scoring. Coming soon.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c800c0d49f944831ac2e5/672aaf28c93a8b2d17ee7f7b_crystall-ball.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/666c800c0d49f944831ac2e5/672ab838c93a8b2d17f6d5d0_notification-predict.png)

**Vector: The Future of Sales Prospecting**

Founded in 2022 and hailing from Boston, Vector is a fresh entrant into the B2B SaaS landscape, having made waves as part of Y Combinator Batch W23. With a mission to identify potential customers who are most likely to buy, Vector is positioned as the world‚Äôs first intent platform dedicated to revealing which contacts are actively in-market before they even visit your website. 

### What Does Vector Do?

Vector's core offering revolves around "contact-level intent" and "site de-anonymization." This means it can pinpoint specific individuals who show buying signals, helping you to focus your sales efforts more efficiently. By leveraging generative AI, Vector enables businesses to create hyper-targeted marketing campaigns that save time, reduce wasted ad spend, and ultimately turn prospects into revenue.

But that‚Äôs just the beginning. Here's a quick look at their features:

- **Contact-Level Website Identification**: Understand who is visiting your site and what they're interested in, eliminating the "ghost" problem many marketers face.
- **Contact-Level Intent**: Know what potential buyers are searching for even before they land on your site.
- **Hyper-Targeted Ad Audiences**: Build ad audiences based on individual intent to ensure your message hits the right people.

### Who‚Äôs Behind Vector?

At its helm, you'll find a compact team of just two, which speaks to the agility and focus of the startup. Brad Flora serves as their Group Partner, bringing considerable experience and insight to the team. 

### Integration and Resources

Vector distinguishes itself through robust integrations with platforms like Hubspot, Salesforce, and Slack, making it a versatile addition to any marketing tech stack. Plus, they offer a variety of resources like playbooks and a comprehensive marketing glossary to empower users.

### Conclusion

For those tired of traditional lead generation methods that yield low conversions and wasted resources, Vector represents a bright alternative. With innovative technology that reveals who your prospects are‚Äîboth on and off your site‚Äîthey are setting a new standard for how businesses can connect with and understand their customers. If you're ready to stop getting ghosted by your leads, check out [Vector's offerings](https://vector.co) for a demo today.
